financialSupport.title: Inkxaso Yezemali
financialSupport.description: Fumana iingcebiso zotyalo-mali ezilungiselelwe wena uze uzimase kwiinkomfa zezemali ezixhobasayo.

gbvSupport.title: Inkxaso ye-GBV
gbvSupport.description: Fumana inkxaso ekhawulezayo neendawo zokukhusela ezikhuselekileyo xa uzifuna kakhulu.

sanitaryAid.title: Uncedo Lococeko
sanitaryAid.description: Fumana iibhokisi zokunikela ezikufutshane uze ufikelele kwizixhobo zococeko ezibalulekileyo.

aiAssistant.title: Umncedisi we-AI
aiAssistant.description: Fumana iimpendulo ezikhawulezayo nesikhokelo kwinkqubo yethu yenkxaso ekrelekrele.

submitRequests.title: Ngenisa Izicelo
submitRequests.description: Ngenisa uze ulandelele izicelo zakho zenkxaso ngenkqubo yethu elula ukuyisebenzisa.

aboutUs.title: Ngathi
aboutUs.description: Funda ngakumbi ngenjongo yethu yokuxhobisa abafazi kulo lonke elaseMzantsi Afrika.

cta.title: Ukulungele Ukuqala?
cta.description: Joyina amawaka abafazi abafumene inkxaso nokuxhotyiswa kwiqonga lethu.

requests.title: Izicelo Zenkxaso
requests.subtitle: Ngenisa izicelo ezintsha uze ulandelele ezikhoyo
requests.noRequestsDesc: Qala ngokungenisa isicelo sakho sokuqala senkxaso
requests.name: Igama

req003.description: Ndikhangela iibhokisi zokunikela ezikufutshane zemiveliso yococeko

finance.title: Ukuxhobisa Ngezemali
finance.subtitle: Fumana iingcebiso zezemali ezilungiselelweyo, ziya kwiinkomfa ezixhobisayo, kwaye wakhe indlela yakho yokuzimela ngezemali

seminar1.title: Abafazi Kwishishini: Ukuqala Utyalo-mali Lwakho Lokuqala
seminar1.description: Funda iziseko zotyalo-mali nokuba ungaqala njani ukwakha ubutyebi bekamva lakho.

seminar2.title: Iworkshop Yokuzimela Ngezemali
seminar2.description: Amaqhinga asebenzayo okufezekisa ukuzimela ngezemali njengosaziwayo wesifazane.

seminar3.title: Uhlahlo-lwabiwo Mali Nokonga Koomama Abazimeleyo
seminar3.description: Izakhono ezibalulekileyo zohlahlo-lwabiwo mali namaqhinga okonga alungiselelwe oomama abazimeleyo.

emergencyFund.title: Yakha Ingxowa-mali Yongxamiseko
emergencyFund.description: Qala ngokonga iindleko zeenyanga ezi-3-6 kwiimeko ezingalindelekanga.

education.title: Tyala Imali Kwimfundo Yezemali
education.description: Ulwazi lunamandla. Funda ngohlahlo-lwabiwo mali, utyalo-mali, kunye nocwangciso lwezemali.

diversifyIncome.title: Yahlula Ingeniso Yakho
diversifyIncome.description: Yenza imithombo eminingi yengeniso ukwandisa uzinzo lwezemali.

retirement.title: Cwangcisa Umhlalaphantsi Kwangoko
retirement.description: Okukhona uqala kwangoko, kokukhona imali yakho inexesha elininzi lokukhula.

trackExpenses.title: Landela Iindleko Zakho
trackExpenses.description: Ukuqonda ukuba imali yakho iya phi kuyinyathelo lokuqala ekulawuleni izemali.

sanitaryAid.title: Uncedo Lococeko & Inkxaso Yococeko
sanitaryAid.subtitle: Fikelela kwiimveliso zococeko zasimahla kunye nezinto ezibalulekileyo zococeko kwiibhokisi zethu zokunikela kulo lonke elaseMzantsi Afrika

capeTown.name: Ithala Leencwadi Eliphakathi LaseKapa
capeTown.address: 60 Strand Street, Iziko Lesixeko SaseKapa, eNtshona Koloni
capeTown.hours: Mvulo-Lwesihlanu: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM, Mgqibelo: 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM
capeTown.description: Ikwisango eliphambili. Ukufikelela kwasimahla kwiimveliso zococeko ezibalulekileyo kubafazi abasweleyo.

johannesburg.name: Ikliniki Yezempilo Yabafazi YaseRhawutini
johannesburg.hours: Mvulo-Lwesihlanu: 7:00 AM - 7:00 PM, Iimpelasonto: 8:00 AM - 2:00 PM
johannesburg.description: Iimveliso zococeko zasimahla zifumaneka kwindawo yokwamkela. Akukho mibuzo ibuzwayo.

durban.name: Iziko Loluntu LaseThekwini
durban.address: 45 Dr Pixley KaSeme Street, Iziko LaseThekwini, eKwaZulu-Natal
durban.description: Ibhokisi yokunikela exhaswa luluntu. Zincedise ngoko ukufuna.

tips.tip1: Tshintsha iimveliso zococeko rhoqo kwiiyure ezi-4-6
tips.tip2: Hlamba izandla ngaphambi nangasemva kokutshintsha iimveliso
tips.tip4: Gcina iimveliso ezingasetyenziswanga kwindawo eyomileyo, epholileyo

tips.tip1: Hlamba umzimba wonke mihla ngesepha ethambileyo
tips.tip3: Gcina indawo yakho yabucala icocekile ize yome
tips.tip4: Sela amanzi amaninzi uze utye ukutya okunesondlo esifanelekileyo

tips.tip2: Iitii ezishushu zinokunceda ukunciphisa iintlungu zexesha lenyanga
tips.tip4: Funa uncedo lwezonyango ukuba kukho iingxaki ezingaqhelekanga

donation.title: Nikela Ngeemveliso
donation.description: Samkela izipho zeemveliso zococeko ukunceda abafazi basekuhlaleni. Ezi zinto zibaluleke kakhulu:

items.sanitaryProducts: Iimveliso zococeko lwexesha lenyanga (amapedi, iitamponi, iikopi)

gbvSupport.title: Inkxaso ye-GBV & Iindawo Zokukhusela Ezikhuselekileyo
gbvSupport.subtitle: Inkxaso ekhawulezayo kunye neendawo zokukhusela ezikhuselekileyo kubafazi abajongene nobundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini

emergencyAlert.title: Ukwingozi Ekhawulezayo?
emergencyAlert.description: Biza u-0800 428 428 (Iziko Lolawulo lwe-GBV) okanye u-10111 (amaPolisa) ngoko nangoko. Ezi nkonzo zifumaneka i-24/7 kwaye zisimahla ngokupheleleyo.

safeHaven.name: Indawo Yokukhusela Yabafazi i-Safe Haven
safeHaven.description: Indawo ekhuselekileyo enikezela ngenkxaso epheleleyo kubafazi nabantwana ababalekela ubundlobongela basekhaya.

ubuntu.name: Indawo Yokukhusela Yabafazi i-Ubuntu
ubuntu.description: Ukunikezela ngendawo ekhuselekileyo kunye neenkonzo zenkxaso ezipheleleyo kubaphilisi bobundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini.

themba.name: Indlu ka-Themba
themba.description: Indawo yokukhusela esekelwe luluntu enikezela ngokhuseleko olukhawulezayo kunye neenkqubo zokuxhobisa zexesha elide.

gbvCommand.name: Iziko Lesizwe Lolawulo lwe-GBV
gbvCommand.description: Umgca woncedo we-24/7 osimahla woncedo olukhawulezayo

aiAssistant.title: Umncedisi we-AI
aiAssistant.subtitle: Fumana iimpendulo ezikhawulezayo nesikhokelo kwinkqubo yethu yenkxaso ekrelekrele
aiAssistant.welcomeMessage: Molo! Ndingumncedisi wakho we-EmpowerHub. Ndilapha ukukunceda ngembuzo malunga neengcebiso zezemali, inkxaso ye-GBV, uncedo lococeko, kunye nazo naziphi na ezinye iinkonzo zenkxaso. Ndingakunceda njani namhlanje?

chat.keyboardHint: Cofa u-Enter ukuthumela, u-Shift+Enter womgca omtsha

aiAssistant.footer: Kwimiba ekhawulezayo, nceda uqhagamshelane nemigca yethu yongxamiseko ngqo

mockResponses.response1: Ndiyaqonda ukuba ufuna uncedo. Makhe ndikubonelele ngesikhokelo kweso sihloko.
mockResponses.response2: Lo ngumbuzo omhle! Ngokwembuzo yakho, ndingacebisa ukuba ujonge amaphepha ethu athile enkxaso ukuze ufumane ulwazi olucacileyo.
mockResponses.response3: Ndilapha ukunceda! Ukuze ufumane uncedo olukhawulezayo kwimiba ekhawulezayo, nceda ungalibali ukuqhagamshelana nemigca yethu yongxamiseko.
mockResponses.response4: Enkosi ngokufikelela. Ndinganceda ukukudibanisa nezixhobo ezifanelekileyo kunye neenkonzo zenkxaso.
mockResponses.response5: Lo ngumbuzo obalulekileyo. Iqonga lethu linikezela ngenkxaso epheleleyo kuzo zonke iinkonzo zezemali, ukhuseleko, kunye nezempilo.

about.title: Malunga ne-EmpowerHub
about.subtitle: I-EmpowerHub ixhobisa abafazi eMzantsi Afrika ngokunika iingcebiso zotyalo-mali ezilungiselelweyo neenkomfa, inkxaso ekhawulezayo ye-GBV kunye neendawo zokukhusela ezikhuselekileyo, kunye nokufikelela kwiibhokisi zokunikela zococeko. Esi sisombululo esidibanisiweyo sibonisa ukuzinikela kwethu ekuqiniseni ukuzimela, ukhuseleko, nesidima.
about.missionText: Ukudala iqonga elidibanisiweyo elixhobisa abafazi kulo lonke elaseMzantsi Afrika ngokunika iinkonzo zenkxaso ezibanzi ezijongene nokuzimela kwezemali, ukhuseleko lomntu, kunye neemfuno zesiseko zococeko kwisombululo esinye esifikelelekayo.

financialEmpowerment.title: Ukuxhobisa Ngezemali
financialEmpowerment.description: Iingcebiso zotyalo-mali ezilungiselelweyo, iinkomfa zezemali, kunye nezixhobo zokwakha ukuzimela kwezoqoqosho.

gbvSupport.title: Inkxaso ye-GBV
gbvSupport.description: Inkxaso ekhawulezayo kunye neendawo zokukhusela ezikhuselekileyo kubafazi abajongene nobundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini.

sanitaryAid.title: Uncedo Lococeko
sanitaryAid.description: Ukufikelela kwiimveliso zococeko ezibalulekileyo ngeebhokisi zokunikela ezibekwe ngobuchule.

empowerment.title: Ukuxhobisa
empowerment.description: Sikholelwa ekuqiniseni ukuzimela kwabafazi ngemfundo, izixhobo, kunye nenkxaso.

safety.title: Ukhuseleko
safety.description: Ukuqinisekisa ukufikelela okukhawulezayo kwiindawo ezikhuselekileyo kunye nenkxaso kubafazi kwiimeko zengxaki.

dignity.title: Isidima
dignity.description: Ukunika izixhobo ezibalulekileyo ngelixa kugcinwa isidima kunye nobumfihlo bomfazi ngamnye.

community.title: Uluntu
community.description: Ukwakha uthungelwano oluqinileyo lwenkxaso ngamanyathelo aqhutywa luluntu kunye nobudlelwane.

about.techDescription: I-EmpowerHub isebenzisa iteknoloji yanamhlanje ukunika iqonga lenkxaso elidibanisiweyo. Umboniso wethu wangoku ubonisa ujongano lomsebenzisi kunye nokusebenza okuphambili, kunye nezicwangciso zokudibanisa iimpawu eziphucukileyo ezibandakanya:

futureFeaturesList.metamask: Ukudibanisa kwe-MetaMask ukuze kube neentengiselwano ezikhuselekileyo

about.demoNote: Lo mboniso ubonisa ingcamango yesombululo esidibanisiweyo, eyilelwe ukuvumela uphuhliso oluzimeleyo lweempawu ngelixa kugcinwa amava omsebenzisi ahambelanayo. Ubume bemodyuli buvumela ukuphuculwa kwexesha elizayo ngaphandle kokuphazamisa ukusebenza okuphambili.
